entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: SW 62 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
